thread.title: Josh Gad is teaming up with the WWE to write a Gorgeous George biopic - WWE Movies -
thread.title_full: Josh Gad is teaming up with the WWE to write a Gorgeous George biopic - WWE News - Movies - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Josh Gad is teaming up with the WWE to write a Gorgeous George biopic - WWE Movies -
text: Josh Gad's next writing project will see him getting into the ring with the WWE.The Frozen star and his partner Ryan Dixon are teaming up with WWE Studios for a biopic about 1950s wrestling star Gorgeous George, reports Deadline. © AP Photo/FSGorgeous George Gorgeous George was a dynamic and highly-controversial performer in the early days of televised wrestling for his flamboyant stage presence.It isn't yet clear if Gad intends to star in the biopic, in addition to writing. © Getty Images / C Flanigan Gad has previously penned a Twins sequel, although it's not clear if that comedy will ever actually be produced.He will next play famed film critic Roger Ebert opposite Will Ferrell in another biopic, and has a role in Disney's Beauty and the Beast reboot lined up.
